title: Texas Association of Naturopathic Doctors
cleaned_text: Bio Dr. Nicole Shusterman was born and raised in Dallas, Texas and is honored to return to her home state to provide individualized naturopathic healthcare. She received her Bachelor's degree in Anthropology with a Minor in Chemistry from the University of Texas at Austin and completed her medical training in Portland, Oregon at NUNM. Her clinical practice is focused on hormonal balance and metabolism, mental health, and digestive issues. She is a dedicated healer and guarantees her due diligence in continuously studying and researching the best solutions to your health concerns. Hallmarks of her practice include customized herbal tincture formulations, homeopathic remedies, and biotherapeutic drainage using UNDA numbers.
